divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving northbound on I-95 early Saturday morning going on vacation. I was in the passenger seat looking out the window towards the east (ocean). I noticed a black boomerang, oddly shaped object high in the sky not moving. It was completely stationary and up pretty high in the sky (it was definitley NOT a kite). Just when I noticed it NOT moving I noticed a small crop plane flying around it. Probably checking the thing out......Oh if I could find that pilot. I was able to take 3 pictures of it while we were driving, they aren't great, but I did catch it. I lost sight of it because we were driving away from it. My oldest son in the back seat saw it too.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around August 16th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Stationary boomerang object sighted early morning.
